transcription.text: Growing up in a Catholic home, Patrick Clair was used to seeing religious iconography. Little did he know he would one day have the opportunity to merge and subvert it with his work at motion graphics studio Antibody, alongside Raoul Marks. Having redefined the art of opening credits during the peak TV era, American Gods (2017â€“present) saw the Antibody team mix religious and patriotic symbolism together for their most daring work yet as they brought the mythologies of Neil Gaiman's source material to life.
